title: Ticket #4755: condor_q -analyze doesn't know about local universe
description:
If you do condor_q -analyze on a local universe job, you get this: 

  WARNING: Job universe unknown.  Analysis may not be meaningful.
remarks:
2014-Dec-05 14:48:37 by wenger:
Oh, yeah -- there's a switch statement in condor_q.V6/queue.cpp that sure looks like it should have CONDOR_UNIVERSE_LOCAL as a case, but doesn't (search for the string "Job universe unknown".
creator: wenger
